title: Christina Torre
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920210141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices) : [Designers](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920210141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Designers) : Christina Torre**

Christina Torre has been with P22 type foundry since January 2000. She graduated from the State University of New York at Buffalo with a BA in Communication Design. Christina has designed a variety of fonts and print materials, and has also designed for the web. She worked at [The Pushpin Group](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920210141/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Pushpin%20Group) in NYC and at Dog Eat Dog Advertising, Inc. in Buffalo, NY.

Typefaces by Christina Torre: [Dearest](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920210141/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/dearest.html), [Mucha](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920210141/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/mucha.html), [Salon](http://web.archive.org/web/20130920210141/http:/www.p22.com/ihof/salon.html)
author: paul d hunt
